title: Gunder Frank vs David Christian Secondary MCQ 1

content.question: The two interpretations of economic history of the early modern period differ most strongly concerning

choices.label: the motivations for European colonization of the Americas
the relative importance of Europe in the global economy
the significance of economic developments in Europe prior to 1500
the justification for European claims of economic superiority

content.answer: the relative importance of Europe in the global economy

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
